question: Does it allow for expandable sd card??

answers.answer:
I just got my Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G and I can confirm without a doubt that there IS a slot for a microSD card! The people thumbing down that response are not paying attention. When you pull out the sim tray, there is a "platform" on the top labeled "sim card 1". You place your sim on that tray. UNDERNEATH is ANOTHER…
        
          see more
        


        I just got my Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G and I can confirm without a doubt that there IS a slot for a microSD card! The people thumbing down that response are not paying attention. When you pull out the sim tray, there is a "platform" on the top labeled "sim card 1". You place your sim on that tray. UNDERNEATH is ANOTHER TRAY! You just turn the tray OVER and the other side says, "sim card 2/microSD card". You put another sim or your microSD card on THAT. Make sure you have the right size SD card, and/or you're putting it in correctly, for those complaining that it doesn't fit. You have to position it a certain way. Unfortunately, I'm using my phone to answer, so I can't show you in a video, but I was able to figure it out by myself. There ARE videos on YouTube, so just Google how to input your microSD for this device, if you want. (It should be common sense, especially with Google, and yet so many people never research anything prior to buying something, and then complain that they bought a device because it said it has a microSD card, and it doesn't). I just lined up the notches of the microSD card (the way the card is cut) with the notches of the tray, and voila! Now I'm off to buy a bigger microSD card (because I know I can!) ;) Good luck!
        
          see less

question: If you are parked at a Truck Stop, will it allow everyone to use it, or is it secure with a password or what?

answers.answer:
Thank you for your question!This product will not allow other users to use the booster as long as there's no other persons in the vehicle with you. This is a multi-user booster, but depending on the signal strength outside, product setup, and other factors, it's going to be a limited range inside the vehicle. If some…
        
          see more
        


        Thank you for your question!This product will not allow other users to use the booster as long as there's no other persons in the vehicle with you. This is a multi-user booster, but depending on the signal strength outside, product setup, and other factors, it's going to be a limited range inside the vehicle. If someone were able to use it, it won't cause you to slow down since it's not the booster that's making the signal, but making the connection outside better. The only limitations are the towers itself that are in the area.If there's any other questions that need to be addressed, please give us a call at 866-294-1660 or contact our online support at: support@wilsonelectronics.comThank you!
        
          see less
